summary: WHILE STARTING VEHICLE, CONSUMER STATES THERE'S A BURNING SMELL AND VEHICLE STARTED TO SHAKE.  NEXT THE ENGINE LIGHT ILLUMINATED. VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO DEALER AND DEALER REPLACED THE IGNITION COIL.  DEALER STATES COILS ARE ON BACK ORDER AND WILL ONLY BE CHANGED AS THEY FAIL.  PLEASE PROVIDE ANY OTHER INFORMATION. TS
